UpperArmsASTricepsDipBand.name: Band-assisted Triceps Dip
UpperArmsASTricepsDipBand.preparation: Place one foot on middle of exercise band with ends looped on shoulder width dip bars. Push band down partially by extending leg. Mountdip bar with arms straight and shoulders above hands. Place other foot on exercise band next to other foot. Keep hips straight.
UpperArmsASTricepsDipBand.execution: Lower body until slight stretch is felt in shoulders. Push body up until arms are straight. Repeat.
UpperArmsASTricepsDipBand.comments: Also see Bandassisted Chest Dips. Easier To decrease difficulty, use thicker band or perform other assisted version of this exercise. Machine assistedSelfassisted Harder To increase difficulty, use thinner band or place bent knees onto band. After some time, finally progress toTriceps Dipswithout assistance.
UpperArmsASTricepsDipBand.synergists: latissimusdorsi, pectoralisminor, pectoralisclavicular, deltoidanterior, levatorscapulae, pectoralissternal, rhomboids
